name: Snake 2
description:
DESCRIPTION
Simple yet fun Snake-like game.

Eat the red apple and grow bigger!
There are also rare golden apples, if you are fast enough to eat them before they disappear you'll become even bigger!!
Finally there are very rare chocolate  biscuits, (snakes like to eat biscuits, you know?). Eat one of those and see what happens!


CONTROLS
Use the arrow keys to move


CREDITS
Graphics by Cosme
